name: PenaltyBox
0:
”Alexa, ask the Penalty Box to tell me a hockey fact.”
”Alexa, open the Penalty Box.”
”Alexa, use the Penalty Box to tell me some hockey trivia.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the penalty box
des: Jump right over the boards and stay onside for this Alexa Skill that expands your knowledge and history of the sport of ice hockey. Simply ask Alexa for a hockey fact, and she'll saucer pass one right to you. Take a 2-minute minor for quizzing Alexa on hockey, and you may find yourself in the Penalty Box!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
